title: Fire set at Montreal bakery is third criminal attack since May, police say
author: The Canadian Press
blurb: Firefighters quickly brought the blaze under control and incendiary objects were found at the scene in Ahuntsic-Cartierville.

title: Analysis: Letter by six former Quebec premiers stirs backlash
author: Aaron Derfel
blurb: "The thought that six premiers ... would be driven by a lobby group, that they would be driven by helping out friends, is completely preposterous," André Fortin says.

title: Bring them home, Israel supporters chant at Montreal rally for Gaza hostages
author: Susan Schwartz
blurb: Two Canadians are among those believed to be held by Hamas.

title: Montreal's first snowfall: Here this morning, gone by Halloween
author: Montreal Gazette

title: PQ leader says independence would not mean sacrifices; staying in Canada does
author: Philip Authier
blurb: The argument for federalism has never been weaker, party leader Paul St-Pierre Plamondon said.
